cards.title: The Start
cards.text: Our journey begins in Buenos Aires, Argentina, where we officially started Finesiteâ€™s first team, with members both from our dear country and the rest of the world.

cards.title: The Development
cards.text: The idea of Finesite started in July of 2022 with the objective of creating a company that provides businesses with smart and efficient web services that simplify the task for them, helping them reach their desired goals in sales, conversions, and leads.

cards.title: What we promote
cards.text: We think that simple and intelligent work combined with ambition and determination makes the perfect formula for success. And we apply that day to day to ensure we surpass our clients expectations.

processes.title: UX Design
processes.text: Research, User Flow, Wireframes, Prototypes and testing.

processes.title: UI Design
processes.text: More detailed and interactive prototypes, refinements.

processes.title: Front-End Development
processes.text: Structure, style and interactivity. Fully visual website or application.

processes.title: Back-End Development
processes.text: Data management, system creation, finished website!

processes.title: Quality Control
processes.text: Quality standards, objectives and plans. Monitoring and testing.
